name: Lay On Hands
trigger: when you touch a creature to draw from your healing pool
effects: restore hit points up to the amount remaining in your healing pool
the pool equals five times your Paladin level
limits: you regain the pool when you finish a long rest
you can expend 5 hit points from the pool to remove the Poisoned condition instead of restoring hit points
